title: Drawing, "Sea Centaur Battles Sea-Monster", ca. 1805
medium: Black chalk on off white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Above at left: Monster with ram head and butterfly wings. A young centaur seen from left and back, has horn in left hand and swinging a fish with right.  Young satyr stepping on his tail.  Below, Monster at right, centaur has seized it with left hand. Upon centaur's back lies woman.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sea Centaur Battles Sea-Monster", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Black chalk on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-497.
